Profile

Throughout my career, I have worked in multiple design disciplines, such as graphic designer, desktop publisher, 3d artist and animator but my expertise lies in front-end web development and web design. As a well-rounded multimedia artist, I can bring a unique perspective on the user interface design of web sites or applications. I am looking for any position which can further my career as front-end developer and presents unique design challenges.
